input.sentences: on easter | the family got everything together to decorate eggs .
they used many different things to color the eggs and make designs on them .
they had a special rack to dry and display the eggs .
they used stencils | paints and crayons to make faces and other designs on the eggs .
when they were done | they stood back to admire their `` egg tree ! ''
output.sentences: We are all set up for the kids to decorate their Easter eggs
Its so great to see the types of things that the kids come up with to decorate their eggs with
its so easy to have all the kids get to dry their eggs with the new rack we bought off Amazon
I think this one was my favorite.
Final product guys, look at all those pretty eggs
